meta_description: Inspiring creativity, connecting people and enriching lives through art. Free admission for all — everyone is welcome here. Visit the Museum Online Collections Take a look at our online collections, which feature an array of objects including works from the Harvey Dunn, Oscar Howe, Marghab Linens and Paul Goble collections, among many others. Visit Online Collections Education The South Dakota Art Museum offers many opportunities for adults and students to learn about art, history, culture and much more. We can tailor experiences to align with content standards from all major educational subjects and your group's interests. Education Programs Join and Support South Dakota Art Museum members make it happen. You inspire creativity, connect people and enrich lives through art! admission_text:
# Apply Now

[Email](mailto:sdsu.admissions@sdstate.edu) [ 800-952-3541 ](tel:)

Explore This Section

[Admissions](/admissions) [Degree Finder](/degree-explorer) [Visit](/admissions/plan-your-visit) [Information Request](/admissions/admissions-info-request-form) [Paying for College](/admissions/paying)

Explore This Section

[Admissions](/admissions) [Degree Finder](/degree-explorer) [Visit](/admissions/plan-your-visit) [Information Request](/admissions/admissions-info-request-form) [Paying for College](/admissions/paying)

## Undergraduate

**This application is for incoming freshmen, transfer students, returning students, international students and nondegree seeking students.**

[Undergraduate Application](https://go.sdstate.edu/apply/)

**Need to access your application, upload documents or check your application status? Visit your Admissions Portal!**

[Admissions Portal](https://go.sdstate.edu/apply/status "Admissions Portal")

### Not ready to apply quite yet? No problem. Check out our

[Step-by-Step College Application Guide](https://www.sdstate.edu/admissions/apply-guide).

## High School Dual Credit

[High school dual credit](https://www.sdstate.edu/continuing-distance-education/high-school-dual-credit "\(opens in a new window\)") allows students to earn high school and college credit simultaneously at a lower tuition cost.

## Graduate
